settings.heading: Expert Running Repair Services for Freight Cars
settings.subheading: FreightCar America's Running Repairs program is revolutionizing the game with a cutting-edge approach to parts delivery and service. Experience lightning-fast turnaround times, a wide range of top-quality selections, and unmatched reliability — all designed to keep you moving forward, faster.

settings.text: FreightCar America's Running Repair Parts Program is setting the bar for speed, simplicity, and reliability in your parts supply chain.

settings.title: Parts On-Demand
settings.text: Parts are in stock and ready to ship so you can count on fast, reliable delivery when you need it most!

settings.title: Built to the Highest Standards
settings.text: Rigorous focus on quality with M1003-certified parts.

settings.title: From a One-Stop Parts Supplier
settings.text: Your one-stop shop for all parts needs! In addition to our running repair parts, we provide in-house manufacturing for all Rail parts and custom fabrication services tailored to meet your unique requirements.

settings.title: With Highly Competitive Pricing
settings.text: Designed with you in mind, our program delivers exceptional value through highly competitive pricing — all while maintaining the quality you can rely on.

settings.title: Here's what to Expect with FreightCar America
Step 1
settings.text: Select the part(s) you are interested in and place them in your cart. You may adjust quantities by typing in your total desired number or adjusting the product quantities using the +/- symbols.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.text:
Once you're ready to purchase, proceed to the checkout page. Shipping costs will be calculated at checkout. Any order over $3,000 will receive free shipping.

*Note: If you have a PO# associated with your order, please include it in the "special notes" field in the cart prior to the checkout page.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.text: You'll receive a confirmation email upon final checkout and a second once your order has shipped with a tracking number. An invoice will be sent to your email once your order has shipped.
